title: Y3shot
author: Y3shot
content: The price of the market for sometimes have not been moving up like what mist young investors expected. The market have been challenging to most investors. The only way young investors can overcome the recent price of the market is to use bitcoin maximalist strategy to invest in bitcoin. The maximalist have so much confidence in bitcoin, they believe in bitcoin no matter how tough the price in the market is, and they consider bitcoin as the best investment than any other cryptocurrency. The maxi only invest in what they believe and understand what will become the end result of what they are investing inthe future.  Maximalist always have success in their investments because they already know what they are into.They see no reason to be scared even if the market is going down.  Those who really understand the market will always overcome tough bear market, but it will be challenging for people who don't have understanding.

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: What I wound simply add is people that are afraid of bitcoin market fluctuations this days, are just total newbies to bitcoin and haven’t experienced a bearish market that hit hard than this before. But for any investor that has been in the crypto space for like 4 to 3 years from now would now cause to fear. In fact in the face of the approaching halving and the exchanges crises bitcoin faces this days I still feel the current price is still better than the other years. Another thing that actually has caused panic or fear in the Mindset of the new investors is the fact that most of them came into bitcoin with the narrative of it been a rich quick scheme and they invested either amounts that they can’t afford to hold for long or some loaned funds and since the market fluctuations aren’t going as they expected it is causing them some trouble

comments.body: Quote from: Y3shot on June 14, 2023, 04:34:38 PMThey see no reason to be scared even if the market is going down.  Those who really understand the market will always overcome tough bear market, but it will be challenging for people who don't have understanding. Bitcoin marketcap got to over $1 trillion, now at half of the marketcap. You are not wrong about what you are saying but know that whales do wake up for bullish season and many of the whales will leave the market and bear season will start again.By next year, before and after bitcoin mining reward halves, you will see the whales waking up again. If you invested in bitcoin at $50000 to $65000 in 2021, you know how much you have lost and the period of time that you have to wait before bitcoin will hit the price and increase above it again.It is better to make a good speculation and invest at the right time. If I invest in bitcoin right now and the price fall, I will not sell because the price will reach over $25000 again and increase far more.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: You have not described properly about the maximalist strategy to invest in Bitcoin or to succeed in the market. It will be more educational if you describe it properly with us and that will be much helpful for the young investors.Anyway Crypto market is totally uncertain. So anything can be happen and we must have strength to face the bear market or a sudden crash in the market. I think the best trading strategy is to do DCA(Dollar Cost Averaging) and need to minimalise the average buying price.To learn about DCA you can read this Article: https://cointelegraph.com/news/what-is-dollar-cost-averaging-dca-and-how-does-it-work/amp

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Many users here are Bitcoin maximalist from their conversations, commonly referring to altcoins as shitcoins. This belief that bitcoin is the only cryptocurrency worth holding has saved many people from buying coins that ended up running down and value and causing losses to their investors.The important thing is to have an understanding on how bitcoin works and not 'believe' in it cause it is cool to do so and many other people are doing it.- Jay -

comments.author: SOKO-DEKE
comments.body: Someone can't become a bitcoin maximalist just with a few or without any experience in the cryptocurrency industry, so it was those set of people who had good knowledge and had experienced some bitcoin market reactions that I can say were bitcoin Bitcoin maximalist.I don't think there will be any newbies in the crypto industry who have such confidence. People that have experience bear markets and bull runs always have some strong confidence due to the knowledge they have gained through the bear market and bull run, especially those who have made huge profits from their Bitcoin investments. They hardly get worried about the bad reactions of the Bitcoin market.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: Lack of knowledge and probably using funds for emergency or borrowed funds will lead to panic at this time of the market. Bitcoin Maximalist are OGs in bitcoin,a newbie should only use the money that he can afford to lose for investing in bitcoin because nobody can predict what amount bitcoin price will be next. Bitcoin volatile nature is what controls the price and if you understand the basic bitcoin investment strategy,then you will know that investing in a long term run will be the best thing one can do to avoid panic when the price goes dip. We must all start from somewhere in our bitcoin journey and it is only  bitcoin knowledge and experience that can make you believe in it.

I remember my first months in the bitcoin sector, it was not easy for me. It was the period that the price was dropping every day and I was tempted almost to sell my coin to avoid further loss. With time I began to understand the sector and the need for patience. I was able to gain confidence and trust in the investment platform that bitcoin offers. I can't state categorically that I am now a bitcoin maximalist because I still fret but I am a bitcoin believer. I believe that investing in bitcoin is profitable for long-term investors. The destination of an unshakable belief in bitcoin is not a day's journey. Newbies need to understand the sector and gain experience in the workings of the industry. It is the depth of their knowledge that will determine their level of conviction that bitcoin is a trustworthy investment. Their experience can infuse boldness and bravery that will make them hodl their coins even in the face of FUD and intimidation from banks and the government.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: I would say you don't need lot of strategies if you understand bitcoin and why it's importance for us in future as well as current time also.The main aim behind it that attracts most of us to it is completely decentralised nature with deflationary nature when the banks are collapsing,fiat is losing significant worth and government always have track over you.So bitcoin eliminates all of them giving you control over your funds which is why people are investing in it but many are attracted because of profits also without understanding the volatility factors and long term holding which is why they face loss whenever dump situation arises so first of all understanding about it is necessary.Then invest and hold for long term which will help you to gain profits also in future.

comments.author: hatshepsut93
comments.body: You don't need to be a maximalist, you just need to use your brain a little and notice that in the past the bull runs were very fast but came after long periods of price decline or stagnation. If this pattern still holds, it just means that holders need to wait, especially for the halvening which traditionally heralded a new bull run.

comments.author: AakZaki
comments.body: The challenge is when the market crashes like it is now. they will be able to survive if they believe and have a backup strategy and spare cash.Seeing the market crash conditions will certainly be a good opportunity to start entering to double profits. There are many factors that must be done to be successful in the market using the best strategy. But the most important thing is how to control your emotions so you don't panic and get ready to buy at lower prices again. Bitcoin will not always go down, there will be bulls after bears.
